topProducts.name: Tres Leches Cake
topProducts.description: A very popular cake available in various flavors and forms like cupcakes and pastries. Described as amazing, delightful, and flavorful.

topProducts.name: Chocolate Cake
topProducts.description: Frequently cited as a favorite and the 'best in the Twin Cities'. Available in different varieties, including flourless and gluten-free options.
quotes: Otherwise their chocolate cakes and cheesecake style cakes are a favorite of mine
The raspberry cream torte, banana cake, flourless chocolate cake, and vanilla tres leches were all very tasty
Best chocolate cake in the Twin Cities

topProducts.name: Soup
topProducts.description: Praised as 'beyond wonderful' and a good choice for cold weather. Served alongside salads and sandwiches, with Artichoke Leek being a specifically mentioned flavor.
quotes: Great Soup and Salad options and Latte/Coffee worthy Desserts

topProducts.name: Salad
topProducts.description: Known for being made with fresh ingredients. A popular option is the 'three salad combo' which offers a variety of flavors and cuisines.
quotes: Great Soup and Salad options and Latte/Coffee worthy Desserts
Food is fantastic I had the Wild Sweet Potato and the red beet asparagus salad and finished it with a amazing tres leches cupcake that was out of this world

topProducts.name: Cheesecake
topProducts.description: Available by the slice or as a whole cake in multiple sizes and flavors. The Classic Vanilla with whipped cream and strawberries is noted for its beautiful presentation.
quotes: Otherwise their chocolate cakes and cheesecake style cakes are a favorite of mine
Recently, I wanted to thank a helpful neighbor by gifting them with a cheesecake

A comfortable cafe atmosphere with soups and salads and entres in one line and a delicious pizza place
Plus it has good wines , coffee, cakes and several kinds of really, really delicious cheesecake

topProducts.name: Scones
topProducts.description: The award-winning Blueberry Lemon Scones are a highlight. They are recommended fresh in the morning and offer a 'European clotted cream / scone experience'.
quotes: Individuals can select from gourmet pizzas to theirÂ own award-winning Blueberry Lemon Scones and Turtle Cake

topProducts.name: Sandwiches
topProducts.description: A staple menu item, served as part of a classic cafe selection with fresh ingredients, alongside soups and salads.
quotes: Great coffee, great cake selection, great sandwiches, pizza,wine and beer

highlightedReviews.author: Jeannie Hill
highlightedReviews.text:
I've been going toÂ Cafe LatteÂ for years and years; meeting clients for business, taking a dear senior friend on an outing, going out to eat with fellow dancers before or after a class, or just for my own pleasure. It's a bit like a salad, soup, and sandwich bar, where you make selections and place your order as you go. However, I'd call this gourmetÂ quality menu entrees.

My favoriteÂ is to order their three salad combos. The selection is great, with a good variety of flavors and cuisines, and they are unusually tasty.Â Cafe LatteÂ serves both timeless, favorite comfort food, but also exceptional lattes, coffee, tea, and desserts. Individuals can select from gourmet pizzas to theirÂ own award-winning Blueberry Lemon Scones and Turtle Cake.

If you want the European clotted cream / scone experience, this is as close as you can come to it in the United States. I highly recommend going for scones first thing in the morning, when you cannot the "fresh out of the oven" flavor.

Recently, I wanted to thank a helpful neighbor by gifting them with a cheesecake. I checkedÂ closer to home, in Minnetonka, Eden Prairie, and Edina - no one else had full cheesecakes ready for pickup-and-go. Not only that, Cafe Latte, has them in three sizes as well as selling cheesecake by the slice. In addition, you have multipleÂ flavors to choose from. For my neighbor, I selected their Classic Vanilla Cheesecake. It's boxed nicely and is a stunning presentation with whipped cream and strawberries on top.

There are three distinct dining areas an upstairs, lower-level tables and booths, as well as the dessert/coffee lounge on the south end. Conveniently, they have two cash register areas.
Large men and women restrooms are available directly across the hall. There is street parking and a paid parking lot across the street on the west. To avoid peak hours, I recommend going mid-afternoon.

Excellent service. Top notch ambience.

highlightedReviews.author: Ia Vang
highlightedReviews.text: The last time I came here, I got overwhelmed and intimidated and just left LOL but that was back in high school. I'm an adult now and this place was still intimidating, but as soon as I got the gist of it, everything was easy and great. The cakes are delish, their pizzas are good, and their salad/sandwich bar is fast-paced. Only thing I'll complain about is that they don't have wifi... being that it's a cafe, I'm not sure why they don't. So if you plan to do school work or anything on your laptop, this may not be the best pick for you!! Overall, still a great establishment <3

highlightedReviews.author: Sandy Waterman
highlightedReviews.text: A favorite since the 1980s, at St. Paul's Victoria and Grand intersection..  Freshly prepared, flavorful salads, soups, coffee shop-style beverages, breads, and desserts, plus amaretto, coffee, and raspberry truffles (all three gluten free!).  Cafeteria line, plus table and booth seating on two levels.

highlightedReviews.author: Michael McMn
highlightedReviews.text:
A comfortable cafe atmosphere with soups and salads and entres in one line and a delicious pizza place
Plus it has good wines , coffee, cakes and several kinds of really, really delicious cheesecake.  Yum!

highlightedReviews.author: Rube Castelar
highlightedReviews.text: The chicken dumpling soup was delicious as well as the smoked turkey sandwich. The German chocolate cake was a bit too sweet for me but overall good. The service was outstanding, shout-out to the girl serving the soup who gave me the soup recommendation :)

highlightedReviews.author: Padraic McGuire
highlightedReviews.text:
As a salad & sandwich cafeteria,   pretty good, kinda spendy.

Xlnt desserts, though I wish they'd bring the Black Forest Cherry cake back.

Sadly they now have a computerized coffee machine, so pretty much downgrade their coffee score. You have a Ristretto button but can't make one?

highlightedReviews.author: Crystal Vrieze
highlightedReviews.text:
Espresso drinks, gluten free flourless chocolate cake and gluten free cheesecake are all that I've had so far and they are very good. The chocolate is a dark chocolate but it's not too dark and not to rich. Its really good. Highly recommend.
I do wish they had more gluten free soup options then I would try the soup. I have only seen two, both of which I couldn't have. Darn food issues ðŸ˜‘

highlightedReviews.author: Christian Engelbrecht
highlightedReviews.text: Visiting yesterday, I saw they were celebrating 40 years and I think I've been coming here about that long. I left Minnesota a while ago, but whenever I come back, this is often the first place I go. In an era of chains and copycat restaurants, I find this place truly unique and really appreciate that. The quality of food, I think, is also exceptional. I always look forward to my bowl of chili and a takeaway slice of turtle cake for later on. Thanks to the owners who started this and kept this going for the last 40 and all the best for the next 40 to come.

highlightedReviews.author: Ken Mbeke
highlightedReviews.text: Great coffee, great cake selection, great sandwiches, pizza,wine and beer! Very spacious facility with both upstairs and downstairs seating.  A great spot to chill, study, or meet up with friends

highlightedReviews.author: asha p
highlightedReviews.text: One of my favourite spots for dessert date night. Have only tried the sweet treats so far, which tend to be on the pricier side. Have dined in a few times but depending on the time/day it can be very busy and hectic. The raspberry cream torte, banana cake, flourless chocolate cake, and vanilla tres leches were all very tasty.
